data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Kocaeli, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kocaeli, Turkey
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Kocaeli do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Kocaeli, Turkey know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Kocaeli a passion to plant another simple church.
Father, I pray that the Herki people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Herki people know you.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,666,187, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Kocaeli words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.section_summary:
the state of Kocaeli, Turkey has a population of 1,676,200.

We estimate Kocaeli has 629 people who might know Jesus, 9,384 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,666,187 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,664 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Kocaeli that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

location.name: Kocaeli
